item.title: Acodis
item.description: Acodis is a Swiss intelligent document processing provider offering AI-powered data extraction and document analysis solutions for regulated industries.

item.title: Amagno
item.description: Amagno is a German enterprise content management and document management system provider offering cloud and on-premise solutions with workflow automation capabilities.

item.title: Attri.AI
item.description: Attri.AI is an AI agent platform provider based in Austin, Texas, offering workflow automation solutions through autonomous agents for document processing and business operations.

item.title: Cloudmersive
item.description: Cloudmersive is a California-based API platform provider offering document processing, conversion, OCR, validation, and security scanning services through RESTful APIs.

item.title: CoreIntegrator
item.description: CoreIntegrator is a Pennsylvania-based workflow automation and accounts payable software provider offering cloud and on-premise solutions for document processing and approval workflows.

item.title: DocSend
item.description: DocSend is a secure document sharing and analytics platform, acquired by Dropbox in 2021, that enables businesses to share, track, and control access to documents through encrypted links.

item.title: Docsumo
item.description: Docsumo is an AI-powered intelligent document processing platform specializing in data extraction from unstructured documents for financial services, insurance, real estate, and accounting industries.

item.title: Ephesoft
item.description: Ephesoft, now Tungsten Transact following its 2022 acquisition by Tungsten Automation, provides intelligent document capture and processing solutions combining OCR, machine learning, and workflow automation.

item.title: Holofin
item.description: Holofin is an AI-powered financial document processing platform specializing in data extraction and analysis of bank statements, invoices, and financial reports.

item.title: iManage
item.description: iManage is a Chicago-based knowledge work platform provider specializing in document and email management software for legal professionals, law firms, and corporate legal departments.

item.title: Infrrd
item.description: Infrrd is a California-based intelligent document processing provider offering AI-powered data extraction solutions for insurance, mortgage, banking, and manufacturing industries.

item.title: Konfuzio
item.description: Konfuzio is an intelligent document processing platform offering AI-powered data extraction, classification, and workflow automation for enterprise document processing.

item.title: Microblink
item.description: Microblink is a Brooklyn-based identity verification and document scanning provider offering AI-powered OCR solutions for identity documents and payment cards across mobile and web platforms.

item.title: Nanonets
item.description: Nanonets is a San Francisco-based intelligent document processing platform offering AI-powered OCR and workflow automation for document-intensive business operations.

item.title: NetDocuments
item.description: NetDocuments is a Utah-based cloud-native document and email management platform provider specializing in secure content management solutions for legal professionals and organizations.

item.title: OnBase - Hyland
item.description: OnBase by Hyland is an Ohio-based enterprise content management and process automation platform provider offering document management, workflow automation, and case management solutions.

item.title: Parascript
item.description: Parascript is a Colorado-based intelligent document processing provider specializing in advanced OCR, handwriting recognition, and automated data extraction for complex documents.

item.title: Qbotica
item.description: Qbotica is an intelligent document processing and robotic process automation provider offering AI-powered data extraction and workflow automation solutions for document-intensive business operations.

item.title: ReadSoft
item.description: ReadSoft, now part of Tungsten Automation (formerly Kofax), is a Swedish-founded document automation provider specializing in invoice processing, accounts payable automation, and forms recognition.

item.title: SmartAdvocate
item.description: SmartAdvocate is a New York-based legal case management software provider specializing in personal injury, mass tort, and litigation practice management with integrated document processing capabilities.
